sourcesContent: import React from "react" import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody } from "reactstrap" import { Circle, FeatureGroup, LayerGroup, LayersControl, Map, Marker, Popup, Rectangle, TileLayer } from "react-leaflet" const { BaseLayer, Overlay } = LayersControl const center = [51.505, -0.09] const rectangle = [[51.49, -0.08], [51.5, -0.06]] class MapLayerControl extends React.Component { render() { return ( Layer Control You're here. Popup ) } } export default MapLayerControl
